desc: Since 1963, We've provided glass, frameless shower and glazing industrial supplies that offers knowledgeable quick service with competitive wholesale prices.

layout.text: Since 1963, we've been making a name for ourselves in the nation's glazing industry. Today, we hold the fastest turnaround times in the entire world. Our product speaks for itself: shiny, durable glass, mirrors, and hardware to seamlessly complete any home or business renovation. From shower doors to sliding dressers to tabletops, we can handle any custom project or bulk order efficiently. Plus, as a wholesaler, our prices are consistently lower than what you'll find elsewhere. When it comes to glazing and industrial supplies, no one offers quicker service or a larger selection than Sy Derin.
